RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Sync All Notes In Group
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: "Sync All Notes In Group" Copies the notes from the left-most track to all others in the group. When a Synced track is created from the instrument menu a "*" is added to the group name to tell the tool to keep all the tracks in this group auto-synced.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: scripts
